column2: simpleWeapons <- tibble(read.csv("simple_weapons.csv")) %>% filter(Available == "TRUE") %>% mutate(Bulk = replace(Bulk, Bulk == "",0))

adventuringGear <- tibble(read.csv("adventuring_gear.csv")) %>% filter(Available == "TRUE") %>% mutate(Bulk = replace(Bulk, Bulk == "",0)) %>% mutate(Bulk = replace_na(Bulk,0)) %>% mutate(Price = replace(Price, Price == "",0))
